subject: Baseball
Accidents and Safety
Automobiles
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Marijuana
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Cardinals pitcher Josh Hancock was drunk at the time of his fatal accident, and marijuana was found in the sport utility vehicle he was driving, according to police.
snippet: St. Louis Cardinals pitcher Josh Hancock was drunk at the time of his fatal accident, and marijuana was found in the sport utility vehicle he was driving, according to police.
